ygData.msgSnippet: (Well it looks as if CyberShark might have a new goal, he was standing in the doorway to where Battera was.) ... He saw that Battera hadn t even noticed him,

(Well it looks as if CyberShark might have a new goal, he was standing in t=
he doorway to where Battera was.)

::CyberShark::

    He saw that Battera =
hadn't even noticed him, and that she was going down the hall, he had enoug=
h power for a minimal cloak, he decided on this (just so I don't mode) beca=
use she had never ignored him before. He slipped into cloak mode and follow=
ed her down the hall.
    As soon as she stopped he stopped, he listened in=
 on the conversation and realized that something was terribly amiss here. B=
attera was under some sort of mind control, he needed to confront Feline, b=
ut his power wasn't up to par. Instead he walked a little bit away, decloak=
ed and started to the CR Chambers. (They are in the same general area right=
? Hot Rod was in one, and they couldn't have been opposite the ship, she ne=
eds to stay close, or slip back in)
    He saw Feline after Battera had lef=
t.
    "I'm here for a recharge," He said. "Power levels kinda low, and I'v=
e been banged up pretty bad."
    He set one for minimal heal, so he would =
still be awake, and hopped in, shut his Optics and healed.
  ----- Original=
 Message ----- 
  From: logomorph@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  =
Sent: Thursday, September 28, 2000 4:51 PM
  Subject: Re: Proposition


  (=
OK this has to take place before HotRod gets out of the CR)


  ::Feline::
=
  She got out of the CR chamber and walked to her work bench.  She 
  opene=
d her left forarm panel and installed the small control board 
  for her ch=
ips.  She had one in HotRod, one in Battera.  She had only 
  one chip left=
 to install.  She picked up the chip and put in her arm 
  with the panel. =
 She then closed her arm panel and smiled.  She could 
  now control the ot=
her bots and not lose the controls.  She started 
  working on a plan to ge=
t HotRod and Battera over to Zardus.  She knew 
  she had to create a diver=
sion to get them all out and with minimal 
  damage.  She didn't want to ha=
nd damaged goods over to Zardus.  She 
  opened her link, "Battera, could y=
ou come to the lab please?"
  She smiled.

  Battera::
  She walked down th=
e hall and to the lab,"Yes, you called for me?"

  Feline:: She opened her =
arm panel and activated the ship inside 
  Battera.

  Battera::
  She felt=
 a surge of information flood her mind. She fell to the round 
  shaking an=
d then stood up as the chip took control of her.  She 
  looked at Feline. =
"What is it that you want?" she said in a rather 
  rough voice.

  Feline:=
:
  She smiled and walked up close to Battera.  SHe whispered into 
  Batte=
ra's ear,"I want you to go to the Allience base and tell Zardus 
  that you=
 now serve him and that I will be going back to the base 
  soon. You are t=
o follow and obey Zardus now. Got it?"

  Battera::
  She smiled evilly and=
 looked at Feline, "Yes, right away."
  She then walked out of the lab.  Sh=
e headed to the entrance and 
  stepped outside of the base.  She transform=
ed into her bat mode and 
  took off towards the sky.  She had the distict =
feeling like she was 
  finally finding her place. 

  (The chip mostly cha=
nges the nature of the bot from maximal to 
  Predacon.  All personallity c=
hances from good natured to evil.  And 
  makes the bot prone to obeying wh=
o ever installed the chip. But it 
  doesn't make them slaves completely)

=
